title: Help! My RP giveaway points got reset!
body: I don't know what happened. My share link has changed. I had 7 points, and I don't want to bug my friends again...

replies.body:
Sorry to have to tell you this but....
those are phishing/scam sites

RP giveaways are NOT a thing.
You might want to run a virus scan on your computer just in case and potentially change your password.
as well as perhaps telling your friends as well if they're doing it too.

> [{quoted}](name=Wolfess,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7O4Xpo9E,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-07T04:43:54.373+0000)
>
> Sorry to have to tell you this but....
> those are phishing/scam sites
> 
> RP giveaways are NOT a thing.
> You might want to run a virus scan on your computer just in case and potentially change your password.
> as well as perhaps telling your friends as well if they're doing it too.

Really? It was in the riot website. Well, I didn't have to give my password, luckily. Thank you

This pains me to say, but Wolfess might be right here. Riot does not do free RP giveaways like this, and this is most likely a phishing/scam site. I'd highly suggest not passing that link around (or posting it here for that matter!) and also let your friends know that it's not legit.

Your best bet would be to take some time to [**secure your account**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204048924-Security-tips) and if your think your account is already compromised then reach out to us through our [**Account Recovery Form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).
